text: In Unity, what is a 'Prefab'? Select one answer.

options.text: A script that allows for procedural generation of content.
A pre-packaged asset that can be used to quickly create instances of a GameObject with predefined components and properties.
A tool for optimizing the performance of a game.
A type of shader used for creating realistic textures.

feedbackCorrect: A Prefab in Unity is a pre-packaged asset that can be used to quickly create instances of a GameObject with predefined components and properties. This allows for efficient and consistent creation of objects.
feedbackIncorrect: A Prefab in Unity is a pre-packaged asset that can be used to quickly create instances of a GameObject with predefined components and properties. This allows for efficient and consistent creation of objects.
